scripts.gen-lut: tsup scripts/gen-lut.ts --out-dir scripts --format esm && node scripts/gen-lut.js
scripts.build:js: pnpm tsup src/lib.ts --out-dir dist --format esm --target safari13 --dts
scripts.build: pnpm build:rust && pnpm build:js && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/file_icons.wasm dist
